dt: {bc}to spring free from the ground or other base by the muscular action of feet and legs
{bc}to move over a position occupied by an opponent's piece in a board game often thereby capturing the piece
{bc}to undergo a vertical or lateral displacement owing to improper alignment of the film on a projector mechanism
{bc}to go from one sequence of instructions in a computer program to another
{bc}to undergo a sudden sharp change in value
{bc}to change or abandon employment especially in violation of contract
{bc}to rise suddenly in rank or status
{bc}to make a sudden physical or verbal attack
{bc}to act, move, or begin before (something, such as a signal)
{bc}to move over (a piece) in a board game
{bc}to leave hastily or in violation of contract
{bc}to make a sudden physical or verbal attack on
{bc}to raise (a bridge partner's bid) by more than one rank
{bc}to abscond after being released from prison on bail
{bc}to leave the company of a ship without authority
{bc}to desert a cause or party especially abruptly
{bc}to start in a race before the starting signal
{bc}to act, move, or begin something before the proper time
{bc}to advance directly to or as if to the head of a line
{bc}to undergo a significant change for the worse that marks the point at which a period of success ends (as for a TV series)

et: probably akin to Low German {it}gumpen{/it} to jump
shortdef: to spring into the air : leap; especially : to spring free from the ground or other base by the muscular action of feet and legs
to move suddenly or involuntarily : start

dt: {bc}a seed of any of several Mexican shrubs (genera {it}Sebastiania{/it} and {it}Sapium{/it}) of the {d_link|spurge|spurge} family that tumbles about because of the movements of the larva of a small {d_link|tortricid|tortricid} moth ({it}Cydia saltitans{/it} synonym {it}C. deshaisiana{/it}) inside it

shortdef: a seed of any of several Mexican shrubs (genera Sebastiania and Sapium) of the spurge family that tumbles about because of the movements of the larva of a small tortricid moth (Cydia saltitans synonym C. deshaisiana) inside it

dt: {bc}a conditioning exercise performed from a standing position by jumping to a position with legs spread and arms raised and then to the original position
{bc}a toy figure of a man jointed and made to jump or dance by means of strings or a sliding stick

shortdef: a conditioning exercise performed from a standing position by jumping to a position with legs spread and arms raised and then to the original position
a toy figure of a man jointed and made to jump or dance by means of strings or a sliding stick

dt: {bc}any of several small hibernating North American rodents (family Zapodidae) with long hind legs and tail and no cheek pouches

shortdef: any of several small hibernating North American rodents (family Zapodidae) with long hind legs and tail and no cheek pouches

dt: {bc}a place or point from which an enterprise, investigation, or discussion is launched

shortdef: a place or point from which an enterprise, investigation, or discussion is launched —called also jumping-off point

dt: {bc}any of numerous plant lice (family Psyllidae) with the femurs thickened and adapted for leaping

shortdef: any of numerous plant lice (family Psyllidae) with the femurs thickened and adapted for leaping

dt: {bc}any of a family (Salticidae) of small spiders that stalk and leap upon their prey

shortdef: any of a family (Salticidae) of small spiders that stalk and leap upon their prey

dt: {bc}the activity or sport of parachuting from a high structure (such as a building, tower, or bridge) or cliff

shortdef: the activity or sport of parachuting from a high structure (such as a building, tower, or bridge) or cliff

dt: {bc}the competitive riding of horses one at a time over a set course of obstacles in which the winner is judged according to ability and speed

shortdef: the competitive riding of horses one at a time over a set course of obstacles in which the winner is judged according to ability and speed
